name: StressFall
description:
It's like Tetris, but you also control a stick figure. Your goal is to not get crushed. That's about it. Also as a note, I didn't end up having the time to make audio.

A & D to move your guy. Left and Right arrows keys to move the blocks, Up arrow to rotate, and Down arrow to move the block down faster.

This isn't just my first Ludum Dare game, but my first game ever! So basically, keep your expectations low, because this was mostly a learning experience for me.
